member.name: GROUP_FILTER
member.summary: The GROUP_FILTER structure provides multicast filtering parameters for multicast IPv6 or IPv4 addresses.

member.name: GROUP_FILTER.gf_interface
member.summary: The interface index of the local interface for the multicast group to filter.

member.name: GROUP_FILTER.gf_group
member.summary: The multicast address group that should be filtered. This may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address.

summary.para: This member can be one of the values from the enumeration type defined in the Ws2ipdef.h header file. This member determines if the list of IP addresses in the gf_numsrc member should be included or excluded.

listheader.description: The filter contains a list of IP addresses to include.
The filter contains a list of IP addresses to exclude.

member.name: GROUP_FILTER.gf_numsrc
member.summary: The number of multicast filter source address entries in the gf_slist member.

member.name: GROUP_FILTER.gf_slist
member.summary: An array of SOCKADDR_STORAGE structures specifying the multicast source addresses to include or exclude. These IP addresses may be either IPv6 or IPv4 addresses, but they must be the same address family (IPv6 or IPv4) as the address specified in the gf_group member..
